intro: Linosyris paniculata, commonly known as the panicled linosyris, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of the Mediterranean. It is characterized by its slender, branched stems and small, delicate yellow flowers that bloom in late spring. The plant typically grows in dry, rocky soils and is well adapted to arid environments. Its leaves are narrow and hairy, which helps reduce water loss. Linosyris paniculata is often found in open habitats such as hillsides and coastal areas.
